summary: This is an email chain from November 13, 2021, discussing a Daily Mail article containing the first interview with Ghislaine Maxwell from prison. The initial email flags the article, and a colleague requests to be sent the fuller interview when it is published.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: The subject of a Daily Mail interview conducted from prison, mentioned as speaking for the first time from behind bars.

events.title: Daily Mail publishes interview with Ghislaine Maxwell
events.description: The Daily Mail publishes an article containing an interview with Ghislaine Maxwell, who speaks from prison for the first time.

keyFacts: Ghislaine Maxwell gave her first interview from prison to a Daily Mail reporter.
The interview was published in an article on November 13, 2021.
The email chain shows internal communication flagging the publication of this interview.
